channel.title: Delta Interface problem
channel.description:
Im having a problem with my icons. First Most of them work except the Emote interface and the Options interface.
Everytime I click them my whole client screws up and it shows this in the cmd:
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-7" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 19029 at client.method36(client.java:2214) at client.method102(client.java:9338) at client.method9(client.java:10508) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:127) at client.run(client.java:5447) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]

item.title: Delta Interface problem
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

Im having a problem with my icons. First Most of them work except the Emote interface and the Options interface.

Everytime I click them my whole client screws up and it shows this in the cmd:
